root.name: Winning Eleven: Pro Evolution Soccer 2007
root.description: OverviewWith over 150 individual moves, techniques and tricks at your disposal, Pro Evolution Soccer 6 enables you to play the beautiful game in any way you see fit. From slick passing moves to hard tackling, crowd-pleasing exhibitions of individual skill to dogged, desperate defending, no other game can rival its ability to capture the essence and atmosphere of the real-life sport. Team names Licensed Teams Arsenal Manchester United Copenhagen Bayern Munich Juventus Olympiacos Rosenborg S.L. Benfica F.C. Porto Sporting CP Celtic Rangers Djurgårdens IF Fotboll Galatasaray S.K. Dynamo Kiev Unlicensed Teams Middlebrook - Bolton Wanderers South East London Reds - Charlton Athletic London FC - Chelsea Merseyside Blue -Everton West London White - Fulham Merseyside Red - Liverpool Man Blue - Manchester City Teesside - Middlesbrough Tyneside - Newcastle United Pompy - Portsmouth Berkshire Blues - Reading South Yorkshire - Sheffield United North East London - Tottenham Hotspur Hertfordshire - Watford East London - West Ham United Lancashire Athletic - Wigan Athletic Patagonia - Boca Juniors Pampas - River Plate Bruxelles - Anderlecht FC Belgium - Club Brugge Caopolo - São Paulo AC Czech - Sparta Prague Athenakos - FC Panathinaikos Constanti - Fenerbahçe FC Bosphorus - Beşiktaş Licensed National Teams This means that the player names are real not made up. Argentina Australia Czech Republic England France Italy Japan Korea Republic Netherlands Spain Sweden Unlicensed National Teams Some of these teams do include real players but a majority don't. Austria Belgium Bulgaria Croatia Denmark Finland Germany Greece Hungary Republic of Ireland Latvia Northern Ireland Norway Poland Portugal Romania Russia Scotland Serbia and Montenegro Slovakia Slovenia Switzerland Turkey Ukraine Wales Cameroon Côte d'Ivoire Ghana Nigeria South Africa Togo Costa Rica Mexico Trinidad and Tobago United States Argentina Brazil Chile Colombia Ecuador Paraguay Peru Uruguay Thailand Saudi Arabia
